summary: Video player project with play/pause controls, spacebar support, timer overlay, and fullscreen mode that fills the screen with the user-chosen background.

existing_features.title: Add a fullscreen button (fixed or floating in the UI) that, when clicked, triggers the browser's Fullscreen API on the background stage element so the entire screen is filled with the user's currently active background (image, video, or YouTube). The button should also serve as an exit-fullscreen toggle when already in fullscreen mode, updating its icon/label accordingly. The button should only be visible when a background is active.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a fullscreen button that fills the entire screen with the user-chosen background color/image
